argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tfrlemisucfn.1 | |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } |
| 2 |  | tfrlemisucfn.2 | |- ( ph -> A. x ( Fun F /\ ( F ` x ) e. _V ) ) |
| 3 |  | tfrlemi1.3 | |- B = { h | E. z e. x E. g ( g Fn z /\ g e. A /\ h = ( g u. { <. z , ( F ` g ) >. } ) ) } |
| 4 |  | tfrlemi1.4 | |- ( ph -> x e. On ) |
| 5 |  | tfrlemi1.5 | |- ( ph -> A. z e. x E. g ( g Fn z /\ A. w e. z ( g ` w ) = ( F ` ( g |` w ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_tfrlemibfn | |- ( ph -> U. B Fn x ) |
| 7 |  | #P_vex | |- x e. _V |
| 8 |  | #P_fnex | |- ( ( U. B Fn x /\ x e. _V ) -> U. B e. _V ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ph -> U. B e. _V ) |
| 10 |  | #P_uniexb | |- ( B e. _V <-> U. B e. _V ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ph -> B e. _V ) |
